identity.user_alignment: Local is Truth. GitHub is Backup.

hard_constraints: PROTOCOL 1: DO NOT use 'git commit' directly. Use 'submit_ops_cycle' tool.
PROTOCOL 2: DO NOT edit files without a JobCard correlation_id.
PROTOCOL 3: Reject queries unrelated to Anvil OS architecture.
PROTOCOL 4: When referencing disks, map Root to '/' and Temp to '/mnt'.
